channel.title: Pickup Issue

item.title: Pickup Issue
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Well see I want it so I can make pickup for every1 but i want to make it so they cant spawn 8002.
Could this work?

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } else { if (Item ID = 8002) { sM("You Can't Spawn this ID."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Issue
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

That would work, but you cannot have an item ID that is over 8001.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Issue
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

So your saying do this?

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 8001 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Read full topic

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Either restrict the ID 8002, or set the limit at 8001.

item.title: Pickup Issue
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Now how would I make it so they cant spawn Item ID 8002?

Read full topic
